QuestData.Title: Crabby Crew Stew
QuestData.Description:
Shouldn't you be in the mines? Look, I won't tell Morrison if you won't. I wouldn't want to be stuck in those mines, either.
We could use a hand out here, though. The crew is getting crabby. We've been eating nothing but slop and the occasional rat for weeks.
I hear one of the deckhands makes a marvelous crab stew. Can I count on you to secure the meat?
QuestData.LogDescription: Collect Lumpy Crab Meat from Sand Scuttlers.
